title: Palmer Penguins Visualization
text:
Below is a Python-generated plot visualizing the Palmer Penguins dataset.

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Load the dataset
url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pic16b-ucla/24W/main/datasets/palmer_penguins.csv"
penguins = pd.read_csv(url)

# Drop rows with missing values in relevant columns
penguins = penguins.dropna(subset=['Species', 'Flipper Length (mm)', 'Body Mass (g)'])

# Scatter plot of flipper length vs. body mass
plt.figure(figsize=(8, 6))
for species, group in penguins.groupby('Species'):
    plt.scatter(group['Flipper Length (mm)'], group['Body Mass (g)'], label=species, alpha=0.7)

plt.title("Flipper Length vs Body Mass by Species")
plt.xlabel("Flipper Length (mm)")
plt.ylabel("Body Mass (g)")
plt.legend(title="Species")
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()
